edit.description: Edit a message using its ID and optionally replace its content with the content of a Markdown file.

args.CHANNEL_ID: The ID of the channel contain the message
args.MSG_ID: The ID of the message to be edited.
args.CONTEXT: Additional text to be appended to the existing or replaced content. No need context if md file is provided

flags.--md-file: Optional. Specify the Markdown file to replace the content of the message.

announcement.description: Send the content of the 'announcement.md' file to Announcement channel.

facebook.description: Get the lastest post from MWC facebook page and send to facebook announcement channel

args.ping ids: Optional. List of id of role or member id to get notify. If 'everyone' is argrument, ping everyone

help.description: Get detailed information about a specific command or a list of available commands.

args.command_name: Optional. The name of the command you want details on. If not provided, a list of all available commands with brief descriptions will be shown.

send.description: Send a message, content of a text file, or an image.

args.MESSAGE_TEXT: The direct message text to be sent. If a file is specified using flags, this text will accompany the file.

flags.--channel-id: Specify the target channel ID. If not provided, the message or file will be sent to the current channel.
flags.--image: Send an image from the './mdo/' directory. Provide the filename with the extension (example: cannot_save.png).
flags.--md-file: Send the content of a Markdown file from the './mdo/' directory. Provide the filename WITHOUT '.md' extension.

timeout.description: Timeout a member for the specified duration. The member will not be able to send messages during the timeout period.

args.member_id: The ID of the member to be timed out.
args.duration: The duration of the timeout. Use d for days, h for hours, m for minutes, and s for seconds. For example, 1d2h30m for 1 day, 2 hours, and 30 minutes.
args.reason: Optional. The reason for the timeout.

flags.--noti-channel: Specify a channel ID to send the timeout notification to this channel (default: channel the message was received)

nickname.description: Set nickname of all member (exclude bot) to **Muelsyse Clone** or most recent nickname

args.nick: Optional. Nickname to all member, if no nick is give, set to 'Muelsyse Clone'

flags.--guild-id: id of the guild to change nickname. (default: MMM server id)

birthday.description: Set/remove birthday role from members depend on date that command was execute

prune.description: Delete recent message from specific member

args.member id: The ID of the member to delete message
args.number of message: The number of recent message to delete

flags.--limit: Number of message in a channel to search for member message (default: 20)
